senses.de: To make something more modern or suitable for use now by adding new information or changing its design
senses.ex: Please update your mailing address on the form.

Tips.title: Continuous Action
Tips.description: Use 'update' to show ongoing improvements or changes.
Tips.example: We continuously update our menu to offer fresh flavors.

Tips.title: Frequency
Tips.description: Indicate how often updates occur, such as 'regularly' or 'periodically'.
Tips.example: The team updates the project plan weekly.

Tips.title: Immediacy
Tips.description: Use 'update' when timely changes are applied.
Tips.example: Please update me on any changes before noon.

senses.de: A piece of new information that corrects or changes an understanding of something
senses.ex: I will give you an update on your application next week.

Tips.title: New Development
Tips.description: An update informs about recent changes or developments.
Tips.example: We received an update on the case's progress today.

Tips.title: Expectation Setting
Tips.description: Use 'update' to set expectations for future communication.
Tips.example: I'll need weekly updates on your project's status.

Tips.title: Correcting Info
Tips.description: Updates often clarify or correct previous information.
Tips.example: An update to the earlier report corrected some errors.

senses.de: In computing, to replace a program with a newer version
senses.ex: It's important to regularly update your antivirus software to protect your computer.

Tips.title: Technical Improvement
Tips.description: In computing, it's about improving software or fixing issues.
Tips.example: The latest update improved the software's speed.

Tips.title: Security Enhancement
Tips.description: Updates in computing often patch security vulnerabilities.
Tips.example: The security update addressed the newly found bugs.

Tips.title: Feature Addition
Tips.description: Updates can add new functionalities to applications.
Tips.example: The app's update included new photo editing tools.

Enhance.wordDefinition:
Enhance means to improve, make better or increase the quality of something that already exists. For instance, a musician may enhance a song by adding more instruments or changing the arrangement to make it sound better.

In simple terms, enhancing refers to improving while updating refers to making something more modern or bringing it to its latest version.

Enhancing can be applied to anything that already exists while updating can be applied to anything that has a newer version or when something becomes out-of-date.

Improve.wordDefinition:
Improvement refers to enhancing or making something better than it was before. It typically involves identifying areas that need improvement and taking steps to address them.

Improvement is generally applicable to things that are functional but need enhancement, such as a product's efficiency or a student's grades.

In summary, improvement is about making something better and update is about making something current.

Modernize.wordDefinition:
Modernize refers to making something more modern in terms of technology or design. For example, modernizing a house may include adding smart technology or updating the design to be sleek and contemporary.

Both terms are applicable in different contexts but modernize typically implies a more significant change while update refers to smaller, incremental changes.

Refresh.wordDefinition:
Refresh means to renew or restart something, such as a webpage or a computer screen.

Refresh means to start something again and update means to make something better.

Refurbish.wordDefinition:
Refurbish means to repair or renovate something so that it looks and functions as if it were new. This is generally used for older items or buildings that need a lot of work to make them useful again.

So, in short, refurbish means to restore an older item to its original condition, while update means to make improvements or changes to something to keep it current or better than before.

Renew.wordDefinition:
Renew means to make something new again, or to restart something that has ended.

It is often used when talking about things like renewing a passport or renewing a subscription to a magazine.

The difference between the two is that renewing is about starting something again, while updating is about making something current.

Revise.wordDefinition:
Revise means to make changes to something based on feedback or to make it better. It usually involves looking at the original work and making major changes to improve it.

For example, a student might revise their paper based on feedback from their teacher. They'd go through it carefully and make big changes to the structure, content, or organization.

Revise is used when you want to make major changes while update is used when you want to make small changes or keep something current.

Upgrade.wordDefinition:
Upgrade implies that there is a new and improved version of something. For example, upgrading your phone or computer means getting a better, advanced or faster version of that device.

Upgrades typically involve replacing the old thing with the new version.

In short, updates are small changes while upgrades are significant improvements.

Updates can be done frequently while upgrades are done once in a while.

quotes.Text: Innovation happens best when people of different backgrounds come together to solve the world's toughest challenges and, in the process, can create new jobs and opportunities. I'm hopeful that updated immigration policies will encourage entrepreneurs from around the world to help tackle these opportunities in the U.S.
quotes.Title: Brazilian Businessman
quotes.Name: Mike Krieger

quotes.Text: The world has today 546 nuclear plants generating electricity. Their experience is being continuously researched, and feedback should be provided to all. Nuclear scientists have to interact with the people of the nation, and academic institutions continuously update nuclear power generation technology and safety.
quotes.Title: Indian Statesman
quotes.Name: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quotes.Text: When I was detoxing from social media, I realized that I was thinking in status updates. It seemed I had trained my brain to translate everything I experienced throughout the day into 140 characters or less.
quotes.Title: American Author
quotes.Name: Glennon Doyle Melton

quotes.Text: Filming a movie is different from a TV show because film is a lot quicker, you get to see the character progress and grow all in one script, and in television, you wait for a weekly update on each character.
quotes.Title: American Actress
quotes.Name: Ariel Winter

quotes.Text: In the old, on-premises world, we had to make updates client by client. With digital, companies need to move quickly and change quickly, and cloud provides a competitive advantage.
quotes.Title: American Businesswoman
quotes.Name: Julie Sweet

quotes.Text: I updated my grilling app, iGrill, today and it now has Facebook integration that lets you see what other people are grilling right now around the world. Awesome.
quotes.Title: American Businessman
quotes.Name: Mark Zuckerberg

quotes.Text: I'd like to keep updating myself. That's the only way to make life interesting. And because I am a performer, I like to do it deliberately and with purpose.
quotes.Title: Indian Actor
quotes.Name: Kamal Haasan

quotes.Text: I expect nothing from the government but I expect everything from people. There is a need to update ourselves, our values and lifestyle.
quotes.Title: Indian Activist
quotes.Name: Sonam Wangchuk

quotes.Text: Even though many couples are choosing to marry later in life, our laws haven't been updated to address dating partner abuse.
quotes.Title: American Politician
quotes.Name: Gabrielle Giffords

quotes.Text: I would love to take 'Ultimata Underworld' and literally update the graphics.
quotes.Title: American Designer
quotes.Name: Warren Spector
